tool.name: NorthingAdjPOA
tool.displayname: Adjust Pile Northing to Plane of Array

param.name: pilesInput
param.dialogReference: Point layer that defines the piles in each row with a unique row ID for each row and a field designating if a pile is a motor or gearbox

param.name: row_ID
param.dialogReference: Field in the pile input feature class that provides a unique value (string or integer) for each row.

param.name: gearboxSQL
param.dialogReference: SQL expression that identifies the field and the value designating a motor or gearbox pile

param.name: poaField
param.dialogReference: Field in the pile feature class that designates the top of pile elevation

param.name: demExist
param.dialogReference: The raster dataset or mosaic dataset that represent the existing surface.

param.name: demGrade
param.dialogReference: The raster dataset or mosaic dataset that represent the graded surface.

param.name: pileOutput
param.dialogReference: A point feature class dataset that has the piles in their adjusted location

tool.summary: Adjusts the northing of piles based on the slope of the plane of array.
tool.usage:
• This tool creates a new adjusted pile layer and retains the original pile northings and adds an adjusted pile northing.

  • Motors or gearboxes must be identified in the pile attribute table. The northings will be adjusted around the motor/gearbox pile.

  • Fields for the grade and reveal at the new northing are calculated. Note that the grading may need to be slightly revised depending on the slope of the plane of array. The steeper the north-south slope, the more the northing will be adjusted. If adjustments are needed, correct any reveals that are out of tolerance, calculate the new grade, and use the Revise Grading Based On Adjusted Planes of Array tool

idCitation.resTitle: Adjust Pile Northing to Plane of Array
